site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to reserved matters approval for Plot 13 with reference 18/6337/RMA (as amended by 20/1209/NMA dated 24th September 2020, 20/5693/NMA dated 1st April 2021, 21/5982/NMA dated 12 August 2022, 23/0621/NMA dated 9 March 2023, and 23/5027/NMA dated 19th January 2024), pursuant to Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme. The following changes to the internal layouts are proposed: Amendment to the unit mix (1no.studio becoming a 1 bed unit in Plot 13S); Rearrangement of the 34no. M4(3) units and addition of 4no. further M4(3) units; Removal of the nursery from the ground floor, adjustment to community facility and residual space to provide flexible A1/A2/B1/D1 unit, and internal reconfiguration to respond to addition of a secondary egress from the basement and the provision of internal corridors. The following amendments to the ground floor frontages and other elevations are proposed: Introduction of facias panels and awnings above the shopfronts, and the introduction of a canopy above the residential entrances. Changes to retail door positions and provision and location of egress doors on the north west and north eastern fa√ßades as well as amendments to the pier size and position; Amendment to the retail elevations, balcony railings and the addition of external canopies added to residential entrances; Entrance off High Street shifted west and widened. Minor additions including the provision of louvers and amendment to the location of inlets; Removal of the external lift to podium; Changes to residential windows to top hung windows. The application also proposes the deletion of Condition 18 and corresponding Informative 7 as a result of the removal of the nursery. Update to the description of development to include Class B1 in the uses for the flexible retail units.
